website_summaries.verdict: If your bird enjoys reflective surfaces and bells, this option is worth trying. Delivers double the playtime punch with a mirrored disco ball and a bell in one package.
pros: Multifaceted disco ball design offers all the appeal of a reflective surface without much risk of birds becoming dependant on a mirror
Ringing bell adds audio and mental stimulation while improving coordination
Plastic hanger is easy to secure
Small enough to fit in compact cages
cons: Its compact dimensions and delicate construction aren’t suitable for larger birds

customer_reviews.title: Foot getting caught
customer_reviews.text: I got this toy 2 days ago and it took 24 hours for my shy parakeet to approach it. Yesterday I found him chirping at it and enjoying it but when he held the bell part his foot got stuck. Some part of the bell or the plastic that fastens it is catching his foot over and over again. Scary. I think I am going to cut the bell part off. Love the disco ball. The bell has got to go.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: My parakeet loved this. I found out he can see his ...
customer_reviews.text: My parakeet loved this. I found out he can see his reflection in it and so then it became his girlfriend and he tried to feed it. I had to move it to a new location because he was spending all his time with "her". I got my bird a real friend and now he's happier and isn't stuck in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Danamarie

customer_reviews.title: He LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: The first day I put this in my parakeets Pulsipher's cage he automatically loved it. I was taking pictures of the birds that day, and EVERY TIME I tried to take Pulsipher's photo he jumped over and posed by that disco ball!! It is for sure his favorite, when he is resting he sits by it, and you can always tell when he is happy cause he'll give it a tap. Sometimes he plays rough with it too. Sometimes he will bend down and touch the bell. A great toy for your bird!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Whitman

customer_reviews.title: Pecker is obsessed with his disco ball!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my parakeet to replace the mirror that my mom put in his cage. Mirrors can be neurologically upsetting for single birds and this was a great alternative. He still gets to look at something shiny but cannot actually see his reflection. Plus he likes to ring the little bell on the end of it. And it's very easy to clean I just wipe it down with water and leave the water droplets on there which is even more fun for Pecker. The disco ball is about the same size as the little bird but it's his favorite toy so he doesn't care.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Shelhamer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is perfect. Budgie satisfaction guaranteed!
customer_reviews.text: My budgie is obsessed with bells and mirrors. This is the best of both worlds. Even with all the toys she's got, this one became her favorite in a matter of hours. I keep a plastic balls and bell toy on the roof of her cage. Since putting the disco ball inside her cage, she divides her time between both locations. And she's less stubborn about going back inside the cage at night.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Better for a lone Budgie I think.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for a lone Budgie (Atticus Finch) and he adored it. I got another one for the new Budgie Bros, and they tolerate it. It doesn't get the attention from two birdies like it did from a loner. When the sun shines on it late in the day is when it gets noticed the most. Other than that, they walk around it like it's an unwanted obstacle. I've taken it out for now.
customer_reviews.author: L M Saxton

customer_reviews.title: Birdy loves it
customer_reviews.text: Until now my cockatiel hasn't been much of a bell ringer but now she uses this as a punching bag. I imagine the mirror ball will get scratched easily but it's not the part she plays with and I hang it away from the cage sides. Fun and interesting to look at. The mirrors aren't very clear so my bird doesn't get infatuated with herself. Worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy for active and friendly parakeet.
customer_reviews.text: My bird absolutely loves, loves, loves this toy. The reflective surfaces.on the ball enhance his attention and affection.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Of BLING for Birds!
customer_reviews.text: My parakeets' cage is full of soft, natural colored toys. This brings a bit of BLING. I thought a Disco Ball just might be too big and obnoxious. But it's great and they love it. They pull it straight out and swing it around. Really funny to watch them. And it doesn't look or feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Disco budgies!
customer_reviews.text: My budgies needed something to amp up the fun for their raging bird parties. This disco ball does it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking. The yellow plastic that hangs onto the ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking. The yellow plastic that hangs onto the cage completely broke off already, when my daughter took it out to clean the cage---it's only been 2 1/2 weeks. I had to hang it upside down by the bell. Not too thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: bellabella

customer_reviews.title: Mamma Kincaid
customer_reviews.text: It's cute and just the right size. Our cockatiel loves it and he's a picky bird
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for budgies!
customer_reviews.text: My little budgie loves his little disco ball, it's perfect for his cage! One of the best toys he has and the little bell rings a lot better than the other toys with bells I got from PetSmart! 10/10 from me.
customer_reviews.author: Kiana

customer_reviews.title: Fun shiny toy that gets a lot of attention
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 conures and this is one of their toys that they all enjoy playing with. It must be the shine the disco ball has, because they are always playing with it. It does wipe clean easily. The hanger could be a bit stronger, so when it breaks from one of them chewing on it, it becomes a fun rolling foot toy :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T

customer_reviews.title: Disco ball decor
customer_reviews.text: I order this as a cage decoration only but probably is going to use as a toy too because birds explore almost all inside the cage just to be safe, but I'm happy and will recommend it for small birds
customer_reviews.author: mumzy

customer_reviews.title: Bodgie the cockatiel LOVES this. He walks back and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bodgie the cockatiel LOVES this. He walks back and forth ringing the bell and batting it multiple times a day. Cheesy hanger, I disassembled it and made a much cuter/longer toy out of it because it wasn't quite suitable.
customer_reviews.author: Everydayisagift

customer_reviews.title: My bird loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy product that my male bird loves. He was alone with mirrors for about a year before I got him and he had bonded with his reflection so I let him play with this from time to time - but not too much or my female gets jealous!
customer_reviews.author: OPCgirl

customer_reviews.title: Shiny, round mirror with a bell...what's a bird NOT going to like about it?
customer_reviews.text: My parakeet is a narcissistic bell-freak, so this two-in-one mirrored ball with a bell is going to make her the happiest bird in the world!
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Bates

customer_reviews.title: JW  PET CO. - DISCO BALL TOY
customer_reviews.text: My Love Bird loves this disco ball, but the bell isn't attached very well, it didn't take him very long to get that bell off of the disco ball and off course, keeping it on is also a trick! But it was fun for a while!
customer_reviews.author: WENDY-MARIE COLLINS

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for small to medium sized birds!
customer_reviews.text: My bird loves this disco ball! Not only does he have fun looking at himself in all of the mirrors but likes ringing the bell too. Great for smaller and medium birds.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Great toy with a great price. Nice large size. Perfect for keets or tiels. I love JW Brand toys. Nicely made and great quality
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Crews

customer_reviews.title: Bird Sleeps On Disco Ball!
customer_reviews.text: Every Bird that I have had LOVES this Disco Ball! My little PARROTLET Loves his ball so much he sleeps on it. NO KIDDING. He squeezes himself between the Ball & side of the cage holding onto the side of the cage he goes to sleep like that. How can that be comfortable? Thanks for making a great product!
customer_reviews.author: K. J. Kanzler

customer_reviews.title: My Parakeets love this
customer_reviews.text: within seconds of putting it the cage my parakeets were playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: JustMeOpinion

customer_reviews.title: loves his new toy
customer_reviews.text: my buddy Jewls loves his new toy in his cage
customer_reviews.author: B Tomolovski

customer_reviews.title: Our dove likes to ring the bell
customer_reviews.text: I was reading about other small disco balls, but they were made with Styrofoam and the mirrors were glued on. This ball is solid plastic and painted with the mirror finish; much safer for our feathered friend.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old bird loved this toy the best!!!
customer_reviews.author: kandedixon

customer_reviews.title: disco toy keeps falling apart
customer_reviews.text: now after two months, I find that disco ball falls apart about every other day - it is so poorly made even with my bird seldom pecking at it - it just won't stay together on its own
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Williams

customer_reviews.title: one if his favorite toys.
customer_reviews.text: My parakeet loves his Disco Ball...one if his favorite toys...have mirrors all around, but not to where they can see themselves...so you don't have to worry about the talking issue...has a bell on it and that's an extra for them to play with. Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Tripi

customer_reviews.title: It's great that the plastic hoop is easy to hook onto ...
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I hung it up, my budgie put her face right up to it. It's great that the plastic hoop is easy to hook onto the cage, same with the plastic hook at the bottom, where the bell is, I can easily hook on homemade toys that I made onto it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cockatiel love his disco ball. He sings to it everyday and love "fighting" with the bell.
customer_reviews.author: Deva Jean-Philippe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my African Gray and it could withstand the beating.
customer_reviews.author: Journee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my baby bird but a little on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my baby bird but a little on the cheap side
customer_reviews.author: Irisrose DeLuna

customer_reviews.title: Sydney loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Because of different bird personalities, it may not be for all birds but my cockatiel plays with it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L.

customer_reviews.title: bird doesn't seem to be interested in any of the ...
customer_reviews.text: bird doesn't seem to be interested in any of the toys I buy. Maybe it will one of these days. lol
customer_reviews.author: P. Grand

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 2/3 of my birds love it. The other one is afraid of it or something.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The plastic hanger is the first thing to go......enough said
customer_reviews.author: Ian Muskal

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: My quaker likes this but it doesn't hang very low so he has a hard time getting to it
customer_reviews.author: Hattiel

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much
customer_reviews.text: The disco ball is huge! I love this so much! Its well made and so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my birds favorites.
customer_reviews.text: Bird loves it! It has held up under his rigorous play.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Chase

customer_reviews.title: I gave a three star because mine came without a ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave a three star because mine came without a bell attached to the bottom. That being said my cockatiel loves this! He normally has no interest in toys but he sings and gives himself kisses in his disco ball all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... THE TOYS AROUND PER MONTH - SO HE'S NOT BORED WITH HIS TOYS
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS ANOTHER TOY HE LOVES - I CHANGE ALL THE TOYS AROUND PER MONTH - SO HE'S NOT BORED WITH HIS TOYS!!!
customer_reviews.author: BIRDLADYMKE

customer_reviews.title: birds love playing with the disco ball
customer_reviews.text: This has held up, birds love playing with the disco ball.
customer_reviews.author: Ayyyy

customer_reviews.title: don't buy a big mirror if you have two or more budgies and a budgie will like the friend (him/herself) inside the mirror more th
customer_reviews.text: Buy this if you have no idea what to buy for your budgie. the small mirror surfaces are attracting the budgies. don't buy a big mirror if you have two or more budgies and a budgie will like the friend (him/herself) inside the mirror more than the real friends in the cage and attack the real friends. so this is a perfect toy.
customer_reviews.author: MyAnonAZ

customer_reviews.title: but after she stared at it a while she conquered her fears and fell in love.
customer_reviews.text: At first my parakeet was completely terrified of this disco ball, but after she stared at it a while she conquered her fears and fell in love.
customer_reviews.author: grimace

customer_reviews.title: My bird loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy....my budgie loves it! A bit bigger than I expected, but still great.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Levesque

customer_reviews.title: It's a hit!
customer_reviews.text: My parrot (a Kakariki) adores her disco ball, she plays with it often and rings its bell with her foot. She regards it as a good friend!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy for both my parakeets, they play daily with this ball
customer_reviews.author: Ljb

product_meta.title: JW Pet Company Activitoy Disco Ball Small Bird Toy, Colors Vary
product_meta.description: This retro disco ball toy will have your bird grooving with the beat. The disco ball activity is covered in tiny reflective squares that give it a mirror effect that small birds love! great for parakeets, cockatiels and similar sized birds.
feature_bullets: Designed for a bird's well being
Great for Parakeets, Cockatiels and similar sized birds

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
